publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2762 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Justice 1 Committee: 3rd Report 2005 (Session 2) of the Justice 1 Committee, Report on Inquiry into the Effectiveness of Rehabilitation in Prisons—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Justice 1 Committee’s 3 rd Report 2005 (Session 2), Inquiry into the Effectiveness of Rehabilitation in Prisons (SP Paper 291).

S2M-2762 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Justice 1 Committee: 3rd Report 2005 (Session 2) of the Justice 1 Committee, Report on Inquiry into the Effectiveness of Rehabilitation in Prisons—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Justice 1 Committee’s 3rd Report 2005 (Session 2), Inquiry into the Effectiveness of Rehabilitation in Prisons (SP Paper 291).
